| History                 = Along with three other [[Triads (Earth-616)|Triads]], the Coiled Serpent Syndicate divided up what used to be the criminal empire of [[Zheng Zu (Earth-616)|Fu Manchu]], after his apparent death a few years earlier per [[MI6 (Earth-616)|MI6]]. At that time it was led by an insane crimelord, [[Mao Liu-Cho (Earth-616)|Mao Liu-Cho]].{{r|X-Men Vol 2 62}} The Triad was one of several that came under the rule of the [[Zheng Bao Yu (Earth-616)|Cursed Lotus]] when she united Hong Kong's underworld and used the Triads to expand her drug empire.{{r|Journey into Mystery Vol 1 514}}
